summary: A woman, whose husband is cheating on her, and an undertaker, who has been in love with her since their childhood, decide to fake her death so they can be together.
cast: Hannah Higgins|Joshua Jenkins|Shaun Phillips|Alfred Molina|Brenda Blethyn|Robert Pugh|Menna Trussler|Jerry Springer|Naomi Watts|Lee Evans|Christopher Walken|Lennie Huhtala|Padrig Owen Jones|Miriam Margolyes|Stan Stennett|Enid Nelmes|Noel Williams|Robert Page|Peggy Mason|Stevie Parry|Dawn Pritchard|Louise Hopkins|Ena Cohen|Maggs Harries|Howell Evans|Patricia Kane|Malcolm Cousins|Dafydd Hywel|Beverly Hotsprings|Dafydd Wyn Roberts
title: Funerarias, S.A.
